snippet: The government reported that the German economy expanded by 3 percent in 2011, but estimated that it actually contracted in the final quarter of the year.
abstract: Germany reports that its economy expanded by 3 percent in 2011 from 2010; notes growth came mostly in first half of 2011, and economy contracted by about 0.25 percent in the fourth quarter from previous quarter.
lead_paragraph: The government reported that the German economy expanded by 3 percent in 2011, but estimated that it actually contracted in the final quarter of the year.

headline.print_headline: German Economy Shows Signs of a Slowdown
